extendedInfo.description: * Try FREE DEMO on the Play Store first! *Welcome to the future of baby monitoring!  This application will turn your Android phone or tablet into a fully functioning, high quality baby monitor.  It uses your home WiFi network to stream video and audio of your baby from the camera on your Android device directly to a web browser on your computer or laptop, or to any other Android device that is attached to your home WiFi network!  So you can be sat downstairs watching a film while your baby sleeps upstairs, allowing you to just flick your laptop open to see and hear exactly what your baby is doing.  Or you can quickly pull your phone out of your pocket while you are cooking dinner in the kitchen to have a quick peek at what mischief your child is causing in their bedroom.Youâll be amazed by the high quality video and audio as well as all the features that let you remotely interact with your baby via the web browser, such as playing lullabies on the Android deviceâs speaker, or switching the Night Light (the camera flash LED) on or off.  With advanced motion detection and monitoring features that chart your babyâs every movement, you have the most efficient possible way to ensure your baby is safe from harm while you are not in the room with them.As you can see, it has all the functionality of the most expensive baby monitors on the market today, but also with added premium features that make this application simply the best way to monitor your baby in this day and age.  Why spend a huge wad of cash on an expensive baby monitor with low quality video and audio when for just a tiny fraction of the price you can spend a small handful of change on this application which offers the same and so much more?------FEATURES1. Monitor you baby by streaming real-time live video and audio from your Android device camera to a web browser or to any other Android device;2. Very simple to use for everybody - no configuration needed ... it just works!3. Switch on Motion Detection to get pinpoint accuracy of every movement your baby makes as well as a handy real-time graph that shows the intensity of movements over time.4. Volume controls and a visual representation of the audio, so you have the option of not listening to the sound but still remain aware of the noises your baby is making;5. Interact with your baby even though you are not in the room â using buttons on the web browser you can switch the Night Light on and off (if your Android device has a camera flash LED) and you can also play lullabies through the Android device speaker, again just by clicking a button in the web browser;6. Remotely control the camera!  Capture precious moments that youâd otherwise miss by taking high resolution pictures and videos using buttons on the web browser; 7. Requires Java installed on the web browser computer; 8. Advanced settings to tweak performance with a choice of streaming resolutions;10. Only uses a WiFi network â does NOT support 3G.  You can stream across the internet by using Port Forwarding â please contact the developer for help doing this;11. LOTS more features in development!------* Before emailing, check FAQs at http://dooblou.blogspot.com ** Follow @dooblou on Twitter for all the latest news and updates as they occur ** Find us on Facebook â Search for âBabyCam Monitorâ *------If you do have problems using this application on your WiFi network, it is most likely a configuration problem with your router/network.  Please contact the developer if you have any questions and he may be able to help you ... but please don't rate low because your network isn't configured properly - that isn't the applicationâs fault ;)

reviews.title: Okay but in the end we purchased a baby monitor
reviews.comment: I thought this would be an alternative to purchasing a baby monitor but i just could not get it to work like I wanted to. I had a old galaxy s which I was hoping could serve as baby unit. I was hoping my Nexus 4 and HTC Amaze could serve as the parent unit. The sound was faint, video was okay, and connection sometimes timed out.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Nkansah

reviews.title: The best option for a live video and audio monitor
reviews.comment: Super easy to use, rich in features, inexpensive, and it even has a nice bit of polish on the UI for the web-based receiver.  If you\'re looking to make use of your old phone as an extra monitor with IP functionality, I\'d recommend starting your search here.
reviews.author: Charles Westbrook

reviews.title: Still some work to be done
Amazing app!
reviews.comment: Ideal for when you\'re away from home and don\'t have your purpose-built monitor with you.  Great features on the web browser and good controls on the receiver app (separate purchase, but still good value for the two apps). Works over wifi so much better than the apps that rely on text message or call alerts. Really simple to use.  Recommended to any parent of young children.
reviews.author: Neil Hawkins

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Saved me buying a baby monitor. Would have given five stars if a night mode camera option was available and also if the receiver was linked as opposed to buying separately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Webpage on pc does not connect. Invalid web page
reviews.author: Kate Berry

reviews.title: Great App at great price
reviews.comment: It\'s working great, I use it for monitoring the home entrance while at work.  I have some suggestions for improvements:    1. The website doesn\'t have a FAQ section or a Help for this app.  2. The interface on the remote PC (monitoring the camera) needs some additional buttons ON and OFF.  After you push any of the existing buttons (Light, Motion Detector, etc) you don\'t know the status or if the action was completed.  3. The motion detector button doesn\'t do much and it seems to turn off by itself after a while.  It would be great if you can have the video recorder started (or just capture) when the motion is detected.  4. The capture setting: it would be nice to have automatically captures at custom intervals (5-10-15-20... seconds or minutes).
reviews.author: Dan Reiko

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works like a charm. This is an extremely cheap and effective solution, especially I you have an old android device laying around. I had one small issue with my router settings and that got solved quickly through great developer support.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good.
reviews.comment: But sometimes it\'s not possible to connect with CamReceiver or browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hp touch pad support
reviews.comment: My viewing device doesn\'t have a working camera, can we have an option to skip camera initialization?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Great as is, does what it says.  That said, I would pay for another app if there was a baby soother (ie, heartbeats and white noise) app that I could remotely activate via the babycam.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works ok, not many options, difficult to set up.
reviews.comment: Don\'t let the price fool you. You actually have to buy 2 apps to get everything out of it.   I had trouble getting the sound to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice App for the Price Does a decent job
reviews.comment: I have used this app for a few months and find it really nice and useful. The only reason i gave it 4 instead of 5 is its lack of full screen video on the Browser Version of the monitor and a little more features related to disconnection(disconnect alarm/ Time since update etc)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs WiFi drop out alarm
reviews.comment: Removed one star .as per other comments,no way of knowing if WiFi has dropped screen freezes and you are unaware of this .a bit if a worry
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty great on the EVO 4G
reviews.comment: Good video and sound quality.  I love the ability to take a snapshot of the video stream.  Well worth the price for the paid app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad for \302\2432
reviews.comment: My wife and I forgot our traditional baby monitor when away from home for a weekend.  Our wireless connection kept dropping out and although this application is not to blame it would have been nice to get a warning.  The result being we slept through our baby crying at times through the night. If you have the money purchase a standard radio baby monitor.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yay!
reviews.comment: Works great! Just as good as a $200 digital monitor..
reviews.author: A Google User
